requestBody.title: Customer one books primary offer API Trace

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.

requestBody.failureMessage: No executor mapping for stepKey=customer-advanced-payment-flow. Add explicit runStep implementation before rerun.

resultPayload.note: Step failed: No executor mapping for stepKey=customer-advanced-payment-flow. Add explicit runStep implementation before rerun.

evidence.error: No executor mapping for stepKey=customer-advanced-payment-flow. Add explicit runStep implementation before rerun.

data.instruction: Execute advanced payment path (split tender and/or tip/gift/credit entitlement usage) and persist allocation evidence.
data.expectedResult: Payment trace clearly links payer, tender mix, and booking/order amounts with no ambiguity.

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.
